title: Ep 62: Milk Frothing and The Bachelor With Emma Gray
itunes:title: Ep 62: Milk Frothing and The Bachelor With Emma Gray
itunes:subtitle: Emma Gray, the co-host of “Here To Make Friends” podcast, joins us to talk Bachelor, milk frothing, and the best “small dose” Instagram follows (you’ll see what we mean soon).  - Follow Gee Thanks! on Insta: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustb...
description:
Emma Gray, the co-host of “Here To Make Friends” podcast, joins us to talk Bachelor, milk frothing, and the best “small dose” Instagram follows (you’ll see what we mean soon). 


  • Follow Gee Thanks! on Insta: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod! I wanna see you there!
  • Join the Facebook group!: https://www.facebook.com/groups/geethanks/ 
  • Do you like this podcast? LEAVE A REVIEW! It’s the easiest way to support the podcast and it costs you nothing. You have my forever gratitude.
  • Any suggestions, comments, questions, concerns? PLEASE! EMAIL! ME! I want to hear from you! Caroline@GeeThanksJustBoughtIt.Com 


Mentioned On This Episode!

  • Here to Make Friends: https://play.acast.com/s/heretomakefriends
  • The Milk Frother: https://amzn.to/39seT9q
  • The Folding Bike: https://amzn.to/2Yo7amj
  • Turtle Creek Lane: https://turtlecreeklane.com/
  • The Class: https://www.theclass.com/
